post.author: Admin
post.title: Help Filling Treat Bags
post.description:
Dear Band Families,

post.content:
Dear Band Families,

The response for the Band Treat bags has been amazing! Our band has very supportive parents and I am so happy to be in a group of such great people.

I thought I would easily fill the small treat bags I had envisioned and then the candy just kept flowing in. Now we are in need of filling bigger bags and so now I’m in need of help J. I will start working on the bags at noon tomorrow (Thursday). If anyone would like to join me in candy land :) that would be great. See address below.

Thanks,

Becky Cozzens
9361 Chesapeake Drive
North Royalton
